actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-368.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 250 - 151 (Record Vote No: 340).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of (H.R. 3566) to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1982 and 1983 for international security and development assistance and for the Peace Corps, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3566 (International development assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of (H.R. 3566) to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1982 and 1983 for international security and development assistance and for the Peace Corps, and for other purposes.
